questions.question: What is the largest continent?
questions.hint: It includes countries like China, India, and Russia
explanations: Asia is the largest continent by both area and population.

questions.question: Which river is the longest in the world?
questions.hint: It flows through Egypt and several other African countries
explanations: The Nile River is traditionally considered the longest river in the world at about 4,135 miles.

questions.question: Which countries border the United States?
questions.hint: One is north, one is south
explanations: The United States borders Canada to the north and Mexico to the south.

questions.question: What is the capital of Australia?
explanations: Canberra is the capital of Australia, even though Sydney and Melbourne are larger cities.

questions.question: Which mountain range contains Mount Everest?
questions.hint: This range is in Asia, between India and Tibet
explanations: Mount Everest is located in the Himalayas, on the border between Nepal and Tibet.
